path = os.path.join(WD, 'data_files', 'core_depthplot')
program_ran, plot_name = ipmag.core_depthplot(input_dir_path=path, spc_file
    ='pmag_specimens.txt', samp_file='er_samples.txt', meth='AF', step=15,
    data_model_num=2)
self.assertTrue(program_ran)
self.assertEqual(plot_name, 'DSDP Site 522_m:_LT-AF-Z_core-depthplot.svg')
